# Teams module

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/teams>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T23:25:19.290609

---

Module import path: /Fortnite.com/Teams

- [`Fortnite.com`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom)
- **`Teams`**

## Interfaces

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [`fort_team_collection`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/teams/fort_team_collection) | Collection used to manage `team`s and `agent`s on those teams. Use `fort_playspace.GetTeamCollection()` to get the `team_collection` for the active experience. |

## Enumerations

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [`team_attitude`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/teams/team_attitude) | A generic set of team attitudes. Use this enum to model relationship behavior between your experience's agents/teams. |
